name: Bee Get Big
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Join Herb, a little bee destined for a big future. Help Herb collect pollen in his quest to become the biggest bee there is!

This game was made in 48hrs for the Spring 2D Game Jam 2021!

CONTROLS:

A/D or Left/Right to move horizontally

Hold Space to fly

CREDITS:

Animations by Paula N. U.

Backgrounds and Player Movement by J. Alex Carney

UI/UX by Casey Fields

Background Music: Sonatina No 2 in F Major Rondo 
Composed by Beethoven
Recorded by Joel Cummins
